body.name: Storage Cabinet with Handmade Natural Rattan Doors, Rattan Cabinet Sideboard Buffet Cabinet, Accent Cabinet for Living Room, Hallway, Dining Room, Entryway
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 21 hrs 37 mins
features: 【DURABLE BUFFET CABINET】This cabinet with doors measurements 31" L x 16" W x 31" H, with large storage space with 2 shelves inside and sturdy top table, maximized your storage space. The cabinet is made of high-grade MDF boards and solid metal legs , which promises a long service life. It holds up to 210 pounds in total.

【MULTIFUNCTIONAL RATTAN CABINET】 This accent cabinet is a perfect addition to your home! Used as sideboard storage cabinet or buffet cabinet in living room and dinning room, kitchen. Great for large and small spaces, wide applications can meet your various needs. Waterproof paint on the cabinet surface with natural rattan decorated door can effectively prevent moisture.

【NATURAL RATTAN DOORS DESIGN】The rattan decorated doors accent console cabinet is a combination of modern and classic, which is eye catching in your house. The rattan doors adopts natural rattan with handmade weaving technology, and this material is safe and environmentally friendly, ensure no harm and odorless.

【USEFUL STORAGE CABINET】This rattan cabinet with doors in simple style and wood grain make it matching well with other furniture in your home. You can use the sideboard buffet cabinet as TV console table, rattan dresser, entryway cabinet, kitchen storage cabinet, bar cabinet, etc. Great to place your collections or decorations or necessities, make your room tidy and orderly.

【EASY TO ASSEMBLE】This sideboard buffet cabinet comes with clear instructions that shows step to step installation and marked all parts. Smoothly surface is easy to clean. Feel free to contact to us if you have any questions, we will reply to your email and offer solution asap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this buffet cabinet, and it's been a wonderful addition to my living room. I really liked how easy it was to put together – the instructions were clear, and it didn't take much time or effort.It's proven to be quite useful too. The two shelves inside are handy for storing things, and the top part is strong. Placing it in my living room has worked out well, and it fits perfectly, blending seamlessly with my other furniture. The fact that I could easily set it up without much trouble makes it a convenient choice for me in enhancing my living space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth every penny
reviews.reviewText: Cabinet is easy to assemble--all parts were in the box, and all holes lined up. After one little turn of the screwdriver on one cabinet door hinge, the doors lined up perfectly straight. The cabinet feels sturdy and looks like real furniture, not cheap at all. Great neutral color, accurate to the photo, that complements my pine dining table. If you're contemplating this cabinet, don't hesitate; it's an excellent value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, looks exactly like photo. Only thing I’m kind of upset about is that one of the handles is extremely loose and the screws won’t tighten it. Wondering if it’s just a bad handle. Hoping to get in contact with company to see if they can send us a new handle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Inexpensive cabinet and it shows
reviews.reviewText: It is an inexpensive cabinet yes, but the materials and hardware made it feel even cheaper. I needed a cabinet that will store some extra kitchen things. It does that. But it feels so flimsy I really couldn’t store my kitchen aid mixer or anything heavy. When putting it together, I had to undo several steps a few times because the pieces wouldn’t fit together well. The cabinet doors are so difficult to screw together and adjust so that the doors match and close properly. I gave up trying and now I just lift one door slightly upwards just to close the doors together. What a pain! Wish I could return it but it is really heavy for such a cheap looking item. IKEA would be high-end compared to this cabinet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: "Exceptional storage solution! The durable construction and stylish rattan doors add a touch of modernity to my space. Easy assembly with clear instructions made it a hassle-free experience. Highly recommend!"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this! Great price!!
reviews.reviewText: What a nice piece of furniture!! What a great price!! Handles were a bit of a struggle but once figured out it looks great!! Sturdy and adds nice space for storage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not great quality but look nice
reviews.reviewText: These look nice but quality was worse than most of the assemble yourself furniture I have purchased with issues of holes not lining up well or parts not being cut properly one of the backboard pieces was uneven and had to be trimmed up with scissors to get the piece put together alignment as others have mentioned is also not perfect I bought 3 of them and I do like that the cabinet faces have a backing

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Unable to Assemble Due to Poor Product Development
reviews.reviewText: We loved this cabinet at first site on Amazon and ordered it as a couple’s holiday gift. When we finally went to build it today we ran into numerous problems. We decided we could live with the first two but the third made it impossible and we had to pack it back up and ship it back. It was horribly upsetting. 1st issue- damage to corner of a shelf (could live with that), 2nd issue- indentations would not align so back and top would be slightly off (could live with), the 3rd and decision making issues… the screws intended to secure the cabinet would not function properly. They were stripped and would not turn. We opted for the refund and now find ourselves back on the hunt for the perfect storage cabinet for our space. We have put together many pieces of furniture over the years and we’ve never seen something so poorly designed despite how amazing it seems like it should be. The serious disappointment and new hesitation to buy anything we have to construct ourselves again makes me feel as though a simple refund (which by the way required us to repackage all of the pieces which was trying, tape up the box securely, and drive to the UPS Store, carrying in a heavy and large box for return), is not enough. It took away from our Christmas joy. If this company is truly confident in their products, I feel they should look over this returned item and upon finding what we did, not only refund our money but also send out a new cabinet free of charge that they feel confident will construct the way it was intended. If I’d had that confidence, I wouldn’t have requested a refund but rather a trade out for a new cabinet. Sadly, it was so bad, my hopes for that were depleted.
